---------- Input ----------
select * from monthly_sales_1 unpivot(sales for month in (jan, feb, mar, april)) order by empid
---------- Output ---------
SELECT * FROM monthly_sales_1 UNPIVOT(sales FOR month IN (jan, feb, mar, april)) ORDER BY empid
---------- AST ------------

    span: Some(
        0..95,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: Select(
        SelectStmt {
            span: Some(
                0..80,
            ),
            distinct: false,
            select_list: [
                QualifiedName {
                    qualified: [
                        Star(
                            Some(
                                7..8,
                            ),
                        ),
                    ],
                    exclude: None,
                },
            ],
            from: [
                Table {
                    span: Some(
                        14..80,
                    ),
                    catalog: None,
                    database: None,
                    table: Identifier {
                        name: "monthly_sales_1",
                        quote: None,
                        span: Some(
                            14..29,
                        ),
                    },
                    alias: None,
                    travel_point: None,
                    pivot: None,
                    unpivot: Some(
                        Unpivot {
                            value_column: Identifier {
                                name: "sales",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    38..43,
                                ),
                            },
                            column_name: Identifier {
                                name: "month",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    48..53,
                                ),
                            },
                            names: [
                                Identifier {
                                    name: "jan",
                                    quote: None,
                                    span: Some(
                                        58..61,
                                    ),
                                },
                                Identifier {
                                    name: "feb",
                                    quote: None,
                                    span: Some(
                                        63..66,
                                    ),
                                },

                                    name: "mar",
                                    quote: None,
                                    span: Some(
                                        68..71,
                                    ),
                                },
                                Identifier {
                                    name: "april",
                                    quote: None,
                                    span: Some(
                                        73..78,
                                    ),
                                },
                            ],
                        },
                    ),
                },
            ],
            selection: None,
            group_by: None,
            having: None,
        },
    ),
    order_by: [
        OrderByExpr {
            expr: ColumnRef {
                span: Some(
                    90..95,
                ),
                database: None,
                table: None,
                column: Identifier {
                    name: "empid",
                    quote: None,
                    span: Some(
                        90..95,
                    ),
                },
            },
            asc: None,
            nulls_first: None,
        },
